bibl.title: A Graeco-Roman Cemetery at Kom El-Kharar.
bibl.note: Behera, near the edge of the Western desert. Description of some graves, fragments of jars and pottery, bronze coins (from Cleopatra VII to Marcus Aurelius).
bibl.seg: Hamada A. and Sh. Farid, A Graeco-Roman Cemetery at Kom El-Kharar.
ASAE 48 (1948) pp. 327-349, 1 fig. et IX pll.
Behera, near the edge of the Western desert. Description of some graves, fragments of jars and pottery, bronze coins (from Cleopatra VII to Marcus Aurelius).
